column1: This file will be used to upload data to the NelsonDB. FIELD NAMES CAN BE ADDED, BUT SHOULD BE DONE SPARINGLY

column2: For recording all info about the culture.

column7: Definition
The experiment name to which the culture is a part of.
A unique ID for individual cultures. MUST BE UNIQUE.
The media in which the culture was grown.
The location name of where the culture is located.
A more human readable name for the culture.
The type of microbe that is observed in the culture.
Cultures are often plated many times to try to isolatestock unique isolatestocks. This tracks progress in this cycle.
If the culture has been diluted. Example 1:10
The location and/or filename of an image of the culture.
Any additional comments about the culture.
The number of colonies observed
The number of microbes observed.
If the culture was grown using seed, provide the Seed ID here. If not applicable, leave blank.
If the culture was grown from a row, provide the Row ID here. If not applicable, leave blank.
If the culture was grown from a plant, provide the Plant ID here. If not applicable, leave blank.
If the culture was grown from a microbe, provide the Microbe ID here. If not applicable, leave blank.
If the culture was grown from a tissue, provide the Tissue ID here. If not applicable, leave blank.
Definition
The city, state, country, zipcode where the location is.
A descriptive name for the location. MUST BE UNIQUE
The building name. Example: Plant Science, Emerson
The room number or name
The shelf in which the culture is located. Example: 1, 2, 3
The column in which the culture is located. Example: A, B, C
The box which the culture is in.
Any additional comments about the location of the culture.
Definition
The citation title which supports the use of the medium.
A unique name for the media. MUST BE UNIQUE
The type of media being used.
A brief description of the media .
A breif description of the preparation of the media.
Any additional comments about the medium.

column2: For recording citation info regarding the culture's media.

column7: Definition
The type of citation. Example: Journal, Website, Textbook
The title of the publication or reference. MUST BE UNIQUE
The url pointing to the paper or article.
The pubmed ID pointing to the paper or article.
Any additional comments about the citation.

column2: For recording information about a locality.

column7: Definition
The locality's city name.
The locality's state.
The locality's country.
The locality's zipcode.
